shortdesc.ph: The configurations for CDN live stream transcoding.

pd.p: 输出媒体流的宽，单位为像素。 默认值为 360。

ul.li: When pushing video streams to the CDN, ensure that width is at least 64; otherwise, the Agora server adjusts the value to 64.
When pushing audio streams to the CDN, set width and height as 0.

pd.p: 输出媒体流的高，单位为像素。 默认值为 640。

ul.li: When pushing video streams to the CDN, ensure that height is at least 64; otherwise, the Agora server adjusts the value to 64.
When pushing audio streams to the CDN, set width and height as 0.

plentry.pd: Bitrate The default value is 0. 你可以参考 推流到 CDN 设置该参数的值。
输出媒体流的视频帧率（fps）。 A positive integer. The default value is 15 fps. The value range is [1, 30].The Agora server adjusts any value over 30 to 30.

dlentry.dd: This attribute is obsolete since v2.8.0, and Agora does not recommend it.

ul.li: true: Low latency with unassured quality.
false: (Default) High latency with assured quality.

plentry.pd: 输出媒体流的视频 GOP（Group of Pictures)。 The default value is 30.

pd.p: The encoding specifications of the output video stream. See .
pd.note: If you set this parameter to other values, Agora adjusts it to the default value 100.

plentry.pd: 输出媒体流的视频背景色。 格式为 RGB 定义下的十六进制整数，不要带 # 号。 如 0xFFB6C1 表示浅粉色。 The default value is 0x000000(black).
参与转码合流的主播数量。 The default value is 0.

pd.p: 参与转码合流的每个主播的设置。 Up to 17 hosts can be supported in the same live streaming channel. See .

plentry.pd: The user SEI information in the video. Used to send user-defined SEI information to the CDN. The maximum length is 4096 bytes. See .

Deprecated: This attribute is deprecated.
The metadata sent to the CDN client.
输出媒体流的视频水印。 Ensure that the format of the image is PNG. See .
输出媒体流的视频背景图。 See .
The audio sampling rate (Hz) of the output stream. See .
Audio receive bitrate (Kbps), represented by an instantaneous value. A positive integer. The default value is 48, and the highest value is 128.

输出媒体流的音频声道数。 The default value is 1. 建议取值为 1 或 2。
1: (Default) Mono
2: Stereo.
3: Three audio channels
4: Four audio channels
5: Five audio channels
The codec of the media stream. See .
